u_int16_t  id = 0x100,
u_int16_t  seq = 0x100,
u_int8_t  code = 0,
u_int16_t  sum = 0 
)

Build an ICMPv4 header for the raw socket.

Parameters:
type ICMP type
id Packet ID (default: 0x100)
seq Sequence number (default: 0x100)
code ICMP code (default: 0)
sum ICMP checksum (default: auto-computed)

void usock::RawSocket::buildIPv4 ( std::string  dst,
std::string  src = "",
u_int8_t  proto = IPPROTO_TCP,
u_int16_t  len = 0,
u_int8_t  ttl = 32,
u_int8_t  tos = 0,
u_int16_t  id = 0,
u_int16_t  frag = 0,
u_int16_t  sum = 0 
)

Build an IPv4 header for the raw socket.

Parameters:
dst Destination hostname/address
src Source hostname/address (default: IPv4 address associated to the network interface)
proto Transport protocol (default: TCP)
len Total length of the IPv4 datagram (default: header length + payload length)
ttl Time To Live (default: 32)
tos Type Of Service (default: 0)
id Datagram ID (default: 0)
frag Fragmentation flag (default: 0)
sum IPv4 checksum (default: auto-computed)

void usock::RawSocket::buildTCP ( u_int16_t  sport,
u_int16_t  dport,
u_int8_t  flags,
u_int32_t  seq = 0,
u_int32_t  ack = 0,
u_int16_t  window = 0x1000,
u_int16_t  urgent = 0,
u_int16_t  sum = 0 
)

Build a TCP header for the raw socket.

Parameters:
sport Source port
dport Destination port
flags TCP flags
seq Sequence number (default: randomly generated)
ack ACK number (default: 0)
window Window size (default: 16)
urgent Urgent pointer (default: 0)
sum TCP checksum (default: auto-computed)

u_int16_t  len = 0,
u_int16_t  sum = 0 
)

Build an UDP header for the raw socket.

Parameters:
sport Source port
dport Destination port
len UDP header + payload length (default: auto-computed)
sum UDP checksum (default: auto-computed)
